member.summary: A that has been decoded into its fields.

member.summary: Converts the decoded GUID back to a .

member.summary: Converts the decoded GUID to a binary little-endian representation.

member.name: M:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.ToBigEndianByteArray
member.summary: Converts the decoded GUID to a binary big-endian representation.

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.Variant
member.summary: Gets the 3-bit Variant field of the GUID.

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.Version
member.summary: Gets the 4-bit Version field of the GUID. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.Domain
member.summary: Gets the Domain field of the security GUID. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.LocalIdentifier
member.summary: Gets the Local Identifier field of the security GUID. This is only valid if returns

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets the 60-bit Timestamp field of the GUID. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.PartialTimestamp
member.summary: Gets the 28-bit Timestamp field of the GUID; the lowest 32 bits of the returned value are always zero. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.CreateTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time that this GUID was created, in UTC. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.PartialCreateTime
member.summary: Gets the approximate date and time that this GUID was created, in UTC. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.ClockSequence
member.summary: Gets the 14-bit Clock Sequence field of the GUID. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.PartialClockSequence
member.summary: Gets the 6-bit Clock Sequence field of the GUID. The lowest 8 bits of the returned value are always 0. This is only valid if returns .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.Node
member.summary: Gets the 6-byte (48-bit) Node field of the GUID. This is only valid if returns or .

member.name: P:Cosmos.IdUtils.GuidImplements.Core.DecodedGuid.NodeIsMac
member.summary: Returns true if the Node field is a MAC address; returns false if the Node field is a random value. This is only valid if returns or .
